coreAttributes.name: Faire ticket
coreAttributes.description: A type of fairground ticket given out at the Farmer's Market in Elis. It can be traded in at some of the stalls for special rewards.

effectTooltipLines.line: Exchanged for rewards at stalls in the Farmer's Market

coreAttributes.applyEffects: A small paper ticket, bearing the icon of a bull's head and the word 'Faire'. It can be traded in for special rewards at some of the stalls in the Farmer's Market at Elis.

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] a closer look at the ticket...
